DOC.brief_summary: The objectives of the study are to obtain knowledge about the safety in use, the patients' general impression of the treatment and the pattern of use of ZyComb® in an over-the-counter (OTC) setting.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of Safety of ZyComb® In Patients With Common Cold - ZIP 3000 (XY-005-IM)
DOC.criteria: For inclusion the patient must buy ZyComb® nasal spray with the intention to start using it either the same or the next day.
